backend/main.mo: Actor defining storage maps, user/payment/market types, and state for crypto capital flow, subscriptions, and Telegram integration.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping dashboard symbol‑sync features to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries describing the role of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document setting metadata, fonts, PWA settings, and service worker registration.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, colors, categories, and screenshots.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker handling install, activate, caching logic, and network/cache strategies with automatic versioning.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app setting up routing, theme provider, app shell, and lazy‑loaded pages.
frontend/src/components/AdvancedAssetCha: Renders an advanced multi-layer asset chart with RSI, open interest, confluence detection, and predictive indicators using Recharts.
frontend/src/components/AggregateMarketF: Empty file placeholder with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Layout wrapper providing header, footer, and routed page content.
frontend/src/components/AssetAnalysis.ts: Displays asset selector and detailed analysis view including advanced charting for selected symbols.
frontend/src/components/AssetChart.tsx: Renders a simpler asset chart supporting price, RSI, and open interest views across timeframes.
frontend/src/components/AssetsList.tsx: Empty file placeholder with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/components/BtcMonitor.tsx: Empty file placeholder with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/components/CapitalFlowPropo: Empty file placeholder with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/components/CapitalFlowVisua: Empty file placeholder with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/components/ChecklistSignals: Displays 3‑minute checklist signals for a symbol using candle data and calculated indicators.
frontend/src/components/DominanceDashboa: Shows USD vs BTC dominance trends, crossovers, alerts, and strength analysis with selectable views.
frontend/src/components/ErrorDisplay.tsx: Empty file placeholder with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/components/FlowReversalHist: Empty file placeholder with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/components/FlowReversalNoti: Empty file placeholder with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders footer with branding and external link attribution.
frontend/src/components/GlobalCapitalFlo: Computes regional and segment capital flows from asset data and renders an animated canvas visualization of global flow dynamics.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the application header with branding, subscription badges, and authentication controls using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/IntelligentRecom: Generates institutional-strength crypto recommendations by enhancing assets with setup detection and calibration, displaying sortable insights and details.
frontend/src/components/MarketHours.tsx: Calculates global market session states relative to BRT time and renders status, timing, and progress for each region.
frontend/src/components/MarketTrendMonit: Analyzes multi-interval candle data to detect market turns and displays status with toast alerts and trend indicators.
frontend/src/components/OpportunityRecog: Displays ranked trading opportunities based on selected strategy modality and timeframes, with symbol selection and detailed scoring dialog.
frontend/src/components/OrderBookHeatmap: Renders a heatmap of Binance order book depth with configurable limits, intervals, and liquidity wall detection.
frontend/src/components/OrderBookSymbolS: Loads available symbols and provides a searchable selector for choosing an order book trading pair.
frontend/src/components/PaymentConfirmat: Shows a confirmation modal indicating success or failure of a payment attempt with contextual messaging and styling.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Prompts authenticated users without a profile to enter basic information and saves it through subscription hooks.
frontend/src/components/RouteLoading.tsx: Simple centered loading indicator for route transitions.
frontend/src/components/SearchableAssetS: Provides a popover-based searchable dropdown for selecting an asset symbol with keyboard support.
frontend/src/components/SubscriptionModa: Handles subscription plan selection and payment initiation via Stripe, ICP, or stablecoins, with confirmation feedback.
frontend/src/components/SystemSyncStatus: UI component that checks backend connectivity and validates data structures and functions, displaying sync status with indicators.
frontend/src/components/TimeFrameSelecto: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/TopAssetCard.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/UnifiedCapitalFl: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/USDCapitalDirect: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/USDFlowMap.tsx: Component that calculates and logs USD flow metrics for BTC, ETH, and altcoins, displaying results on a canvas with error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBinanceCandles.ts: Hook fetching Binance futures candlestick data with interval-based caching, retries, and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useBinanceOrderBookDe: Hook fetching Binance order book depth with parsing, retry logic, and adaptive refetch intervals.
frontend/src/hooks/useCapitalFlowProport: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provider and hook managing Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, and auth-client lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useMarketMultiInterva: Hook that fetches multi-interval Binance candle data and aggregates loading, error, and data availability states.
frontend/src/hooks/useOpportunityMarketD: Hook that fetches candles and optional order book data for multiple symbols and intervals, returning a nested map structure.
frontend/src/hooks/useOpportunityRecogni: Fetches market data and computes ranked opportunity scores for preset symbols using a selected strategy and timeframes.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides multiple data-fetching utilities including Binance 24h tickers, short-interval klines, and RSI calculation with retry logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubscription.ts: Implements admin detection, subscription status checks, and related user profile queries using backend actors.
frontend/src/hooks/useThreeMinuteCandles: Fetches 3‑minute Binance Futures candlestick data for a symbol with error handling and periodic refresh.
frontend/src/hooks/useThreeMinuteTimefra: Retrieves a 3‑minute timeframe value from the backend with fallback to a local constant.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles, color variables, themes, typography, and utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/checklistSignals3m.ts: Analyzes 3‑minute candles to generate trend, entry, stop-loss, and target signals based on EMA, swing points, and candle patterns.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Legacy numeric, currency, and percentage formatting helpers that wrap newer precision-based utilities.
frontend/src/lib/institutionalCalibratio: Defines the institutional calibration interface and computes weighted scores for trend, support, volume, technicals, shorts, and wick rejection, producing a composite institutional rating.
frontend/src/lib/institutionalSetup.ts: Detects eight institutional setup criteria such as liquidity, Order Blocks, FVG, and displacement, determining setup completeness and generating a narrative summary.
frontend/src/lib/marketFlipDetection.ts: Detects bull/bear regime flips using EMA20/EMA50 crossovers with confirmation and returns current regime, flip direction, and timing.
frontend/src/lib/marketTurnDetection.ts: Unifies major and micro market turn detection using EMA crossovers and candle-pattern logic, returning turn type, direction, confidence, and debug data.
frontend/src/lib/opportunityScoring.ts: Scores trading opportunities across multiple strategy modalities by checking conditions, computing indicators, and generating a narrative and score.
frontend/src/lib/opportunityTimeframes.t: Defines available timeframe options for opportunity analysis and provides helpers to map IDs to Binance intervals.
frontend/src/lib/orderBookDepthMetrics.t: Provides utilities to calculate order book depth metrics, cumulative depth, liquidity walls, and normalization values.
frontend/src/lib/precision.ts: Implements adaptive numeric, currency, and percentage formatting with magnitude‑based decimal precision and US locale rules.
frontend/src/lib/technicalIndicators.ts: Implements EMA calculation and candlestick pattern detection including swing points, engulfing candles, and pin bars.
frontend/src/lib/timeframes.ts: Defines the constant 3‑minute timeframe and its label.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminSettings.tsx: Admin page for managing Stripe configuration and sending test Telegram posts, with validation and logs.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard with tabs for capital flow, opportunity recognition, market data, and checklist panels.
frontend/src/pages/KnowledgeBase.tsx: Displays educational chapters, supports search, and loads content via an actor backend.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailure.tsx: Shows a payment cancellation message with an option to retry.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccess.tsx: Handles Stripe session verification and subscription activation, showing loading, success, or error states.
frontend/src/pages/PriceAction.tsx: Fetches Binance candle data, runs lightweight pattern analysis, and renders selectable price‑action insights per symbol and timeframe.
frontend/src/types/index.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for crypto assets, metrics, flows, institutional analysis, and related domain models.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and persisting URL parameters using query strings, hash, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration extending colors, fonts, and plugins for the frontend theme.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current architecture, features, issues, and pending feature requests.
